General.Name: ZHEJIANG ASIA-PACIFIC MECHANICAL & ELECTRONIC CO LTD
General.Description: Zhejiang Asia-Pacific Mechanical & Electronic Co.,Ltd engages in the development, manufacture, and sale of automotive parts in China, North America, Europe, Australia, and internationally. The company offers automobile chassis electronic braking system products, intelligent driving products, hub motors, brake calipers, brake discs, disc brake assemblies, drum brakes, and pumps, as well as commercial vehicle brake products. Its products are used in cars and heavy-duty trucks. Zhejiang Asia-Pacific Mechanical & Electronic Co.,Ltd was founded in 2000 and is based in Hangzhou, China.
General.Address: No. 1399, Asia Pacific Road, Hangzhou, China, 311203

3.Name: Ms. Rong  Qiu
